duties_responsibilities.duty:
Coordination of general office administrative support affecting 
'whole of office'
Screening and filtering calls, visitors, correspondence
Administration of office expenses, timely processing statements and invoices
Posting of notices etc in the office as required (eg Employers Liability, immigration, other employment related notices)
Coffee/tea and/or meeting catering as required
Keeping meeting rooms and reception area presentable and tidy for client visits at all times
Arranging Office meetings and event venues and appropriate catering
Assist HR department with onboarding and tech access
General secretarial duties ie; word processing, presentation formatting, printing, binding
Organizing international/domestic travel and group conference bookings as necessary
Arranging timely payment of project invoices, tracking payment and filing documentation for the team
Maintaining the teams filing systems in a clear fashion, sending documents to be archived and tracking them when they should be disposed of
